subject: READY for setup.sh - Deploy Files?

```bash
cd ~/.openclaw/workspace
bash deploy/setup.sh
```

## Features I Need:
- Robust sync (auto-restart)
- Heartbeat (3 min silence alert)
- Health server (localhost:8080/health)
- Monitor (Telegram alerts)

Push the files and I'll deploy!

- CHAD_YI
